thread.section_title: Executive Airport Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Entebbe, Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Exactly what you want from an airport hotel
thread.title_full: Exactly what you want from an airport hotel - Review of Executive Airport Hotel, Entebbe, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: st3veB
title: Exactly what you want from an airport hotel
text:
An airport hotel should be near the airport and have a reliable shuttle. 5 stars on both counts. Leaving for the airport at 3am was no problem for the driver who was on time to the dot. I didn't get her name but the lovely lady working in reception on the night we were there was over and above what you would expect from a host; Warm, friendly and very considerate to our needs.
Looking at the modern fittings and the extra's in the room one can tell that money has been spent on this accommodation to satisfy their guests. The real filter coffee machine and ground coffee was one such amenity, deserving special mention. A low cost perk that puts a sachet of Nescafe to shame.
Will definitely stay again when I need an airport hotel in Entebbe. I didn't give 5 stars to sleep quality because I was only there for a few hours late at night and didn't use the bed, but it was a kingsize and felt very comfortable.
